description: Stock item dimension table containing details of products available for sale, including packaging, pricing, and inventory attributes.

columns.name: StockItemKey
columns.description: Primary key for stock item records.

columns.name: WWIStockItemID
columns.description: Identifier for the stock item in the worldwide database.

columns.name: StockItem
columns.description: Name or description of the stock item.

columns.name: Color
columns.description: Color of the stock item (N/A if not applicable).

columns.name: Brand
columns.description: Brand of the stock item (N/A if not applicable).

columns.name: LeadTimeDays
columns.description: Number of days required for stock replenishment.

columns.name: QuantityPerOuter
columns.description: Number of items per outer package.

columns.name: IsChillerStock
columns.description: Indicates if the item requires chilled storage (boolean: True/False).

columns.name: Barcode
columns.description: Barcode identifier for the stock item (N/A if not applicable).

columns.name: UnitPrice
columns.description: Price per unit of the stock item.

columns.name: TypicalWeightPerUnit
columns.description: Typical weight of a single unit of the item.

columns.name: ValidFrom
columns.description: Start date when this record became valid (datetime).

columns.name: ValidTo
columns.description: End date when this record is valid (datetime, default: 12/31/9999 for current records).

columns.name: LineageKey
columns.description: Key used for tracking data lineage.
